snippet.title: Red Tether Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Red Tether on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1714080/RedTether/

Red Tether is an action-packed “combat-puzzle” roguelite. You will tear apart massive space fleets, using nothing but your advanced tether harpoons. Pull and crash ships into another, rip their components off, then grapple-swing your way out of danger. 

Code/Art/Design: Stefan Widany
Music: Soft and Furious

Press Kit: https://abyssinian-share-16b.notion.site/Red-Tether-2c4ccb99237147bdb49ec786069db6d1
Ongoing Developments: https://trello.com/b/MeGQvwZh/red-tether

Contact 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Sleeper_Games

Mail: stefan [at] sleepergames.com
